title: Fuller
content:
Here is my initial exploration of my first typeface called Fuller.

I would appreciate any feedback.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fuller\_sample.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714001432/http:/typophile.com/files/Fuller_sample.pdf) | 252.27 KB |
author: papercoversrock

comments.content: oh cool. i like it. now i have 1 comment!

Nice job. Could you explain a bit the notion at the top (with the fuller and fullest)?

• Are the artifacts in K M Y and Z intentional?  
• The tail of the two-story g strikes me as too high on the right.

Could we see more words set in the typeface?
